Package org.apache.hadoop.hbase.mapreduce

Class TestHFileOutputFormat2

java.lang.Object
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.mapreduce.TestHFileOutputFormat2
public class TestHFileOutputFormat2 extends Object
Simple test for HFileOutputFormat2. Sets up and runs a mapreduce job that writes hfile output. Creates a few inner classes to implement splits and an inputformat that emits keys and values like those of PerformanceEvaluation.

    • testMRIncrementalLoadWithLocality

      public void testMRIncrementalLoadWithLocality() throws Exception
      Test for HFileOutputFormat2.LOCALITY_SENSITIVE_CONF_KEY = true This test could only check the correctness of original logic if LOCALITY_SENSITIVE_CONF_KEY is set to true. Because MiniHBaseCluster always run with single hostname (and different ports), it's not possible to check the region locality by comparing region locations and DN hostnames. When MiniHBaseCluster supports explicit hostnames parameter (just like MiniDFSCluster does), we could test region locality features more easily.
      Throws:
      Exception

    • testExcludeAllFromMinorCompaction

      public void testExcludeAllFromMinorCompaction() throws Exception
      This test is to test the scenario happened in HBASE-6901. All files are bulk loaded and excluded from minor compaction. Without the fix of HBASE-6901, an ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException will be thrown.
      Throws:
      Exception
